name: css-flex-direction
description: Css module of single purpose classes for flex direction

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-flex-direction.css > css/css-flex-direction.css && tachyons src/css-flex-direction.css --minify > css/css-flex-direction.min.css && tachyons src/css-flex-direction.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
